title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.2 - Official handicapper
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4223.2 - Official handicapper

State Regulations

The racing secretary shall act as the official
handicapper in all races with handicap conditions and shall assign weight to
each nominee according to his sole judgment in the matter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4223.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
